author: _shemnon
content:
I'm going to miss tomorrows meeting.  Two items:
* Besu has TXCreate implemented.  Last roadblock on the chart
* What is the disposition of create transaction init?  Should be as simple as the EOF container goes in code, all data after becomes call data, so it acts like EOFCREATE and TXCREATE.

author: pdobacz
content:
with

> What is the disposition of create transaction init?  Should be as simple as the EOF container goes in code, all data after becomes call data, so it acts like EOFCREATE and TXCREATE.

you mean in https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/pull/78 ? The PR has this version specced out now - data after EOF container is call data. We were planning to discuss this today. IIRC you're in favor of the "no-irregular-state-change" option. If you have any more thoughts on this, please post them here.
